<title level="1" right="Hazard 3" pfs="">[Sacred Geyser](/Hazards.aspx?ID=357)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Environmental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=62" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #187: The Seventh Arch](/Sources.aspx?ID=192) pg. 60</row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

A geyser of boiling water erupts at any character who attempts to take water from the oasis.

---

**Stealth**
DC 19 (trained)

**Disable**
DC 21 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) (trained) to concoct a mechanism for indirectly harvesting the water from a safe distance

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Boiling Geyser** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature dips a vessel or otherwise attempts to remove water from the oasis; **Effect** A jet of magical boiling water targets the triggering creature and affects all creatures within 5 feet of the target. Creatures caught in the burst take 2d10+13 fire damage (basic DC 23 Refex save).

---
**Reset**
The geyser resets automatically and adapts to previous circumvention, requiring a new check to disable it each time.
